author: thorsten
msg: Add support for Ajax with CForms.
Bugfix: Bug 37068. Submitted by Felix Röthenbacher. Thx Felix.

author: thorsten
msg: Adds a cforms doctype to the default publication to show the possibilites of
CForms/Ajax together with Lenya.
See http://wiki.apache.org/lenya/HowToCFormsInLenya1.4 for some basic notes.
There is still an issue with saving the document when Ajax is used.
Cooperation work with Felix Röthenbacher who provided a patch for that.
Solves Bug 37069. Thx Felix.

author: brett
msg: PR: MNG-122
finish cleanup artifact/plugin not found exception

author: deweese
msg: 1) New MacRenderer implementation that avoids 10x slowdown on
Tiger.
2) Update to the handling of clipping in AbstractGraphicsNode.
This avoids 'dirty bits' with Mac Renderer and potentially
avoids other rendering errors around the edges of clipped
regions.

author: thorsten
msg: Views v2 codename: (views-) structurer
- forrest:call-template is not working anymore you have to use <jx:import uri="cocoon://prepare.tiles.export-link"/> instead
- forrest:contracts: You have to include nuggets now with jx:import as well:
<forrest:property name="content-minitoc-toc" nugget="get.toc">
- <url>#{$cocoon/parameters/getRequest}.toc.xml</url>
+ <jx:import uri="cocoon://#{$cocoon/parameters/getRequest}.toc.xml"/>
</forrest:property>
- All matches in the structurer are using now the lm.
- No xincludes any more in the structurer, this has to be done now with jx:import.
- generally slimed done processing pipelines.
In a second step I will refactor as well themes.
HEADSUP: I did not updated the pelt theme yet! This theme will be broken till I changed the nugget contracts and the forrest:call-templates.
